fields.text: What is the proper way to grip a chef's knife?
Which of the following are considered fundamental cutting techniques? (Select all that apply)
Describe the purpose of honing a knife and how it differs from sharpening.
What are the basic ingredients needed to make pasta dough from scratch?
Which of the following are classic Italian pasta sauces covered in this lesson? (Select all that apply)
Describe the process of making cheese ravioli from scratch, including the ingredients for the filling and the steps to assemble and cook the ravioli.
Which of the following is a key ingredient in many Asian cuisines for adding umami flavor?
Which cooking techniques are commonly used in Asian cuisine? (Select all that apply)
Describe the ingredients and steps involved in making sushi at home.
